segments.text: My eyes keep going back to that poor, wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balanced on it, stretching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those legs are splayed out at such an alarming angle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks like it could just collapse or tip backward at any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s so focused on those cookies, he doesn’t seem to notice the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm genuinely worried he's going to have a nasty fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Imagine the crash if he comes down, perhaps breaking dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The wet floor from the overflowing sink only adds to the peril.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's surprising how brave, or perhaps foolish, children can be.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little hand is already in the jar, though, so he's committed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to reach out and steady the stool for him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This moment feels incredibly tense because of that unstable base.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It truly gives me a fright to see him up there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Hopefully, his grab is quick and successful without incident.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What an incredibly risky endeavor for a sweet treat.
segments.speaker: PAR
